arts.ttl: Neymar’s murky €500m PSG deal: The truth behind football’s biggest transfer
arts.sum: But the published value of the move barely touches on the money that PSG ultimately spent on Neymar, as revealed by The Transfers Podcast Extra . Neymar’s murky €500m PSG deal: The truth behind football’s biggest transfer

arts.ttl: Sir Jim Ratcliffe could save millions as 'next Neymar' emerges at Manchester United
arts.sum: Manchester United have a rich history of producing top talent and Sir Jim Ratcliffe and Co have every right to be excited about one of their latest attacking prospects

arts.ttl: Neymar returns to Brazil squad after 17-month absence
arts.sum: Neymar has been recalled to the Brazil squad after a 17-month absence for the upcoming World Cup qualifiers against Colombia and Argentina.

arts.ttl: Neymar returns to Brazil squad after 17-month absence
arts.sum: Neymar has been recalled to the Brazil squad after a 17-month absence for the upcoming World Cup qualifiers against Colombia and Argentina.

arts.ttl: It's official: Brazil recover Neymar to face Messi
arts.sum: The Santos striker has been included in the list of 23 players that Dorival Junior has announced for the World Cup qualifiers against James Rodriguez's Colombia and Lionel Messi's Argentina Forwards: Neymar (Santos), Matheus Cunha (Wolverhampton), Estevao (Palmeiras), Joao Pedro (Brighton), Raphinha (Barcelona), Rodrygo (Real Madrid), Savinho (Manchester City) and Vinicius Junior (Real Madrid).

arts.ttl: Neymar makes Brazil comeback after 17 months while Feyenoord’s Paixão drops out
arts.sum: As per VI, Neymar is set to make his comeback in the Brazilian national team while head coach Dorival Júnior has dropped Feyenoord's Igor Paixão.

arts.ttl: Neymar returns to Brazil squad after 17-month absence
arts.sum: Neymar has been recalled to the Brazil squad after a 17-month absence for the upcoming World Cup qualifiers against Colombia and Argentina.

arts.ttl: Neymar called up by Brazil after 17-month absence
arts.sum: Both the player and the Canarinha need each other—Neymar to solidify his return to the elite, and Brazil to climb the rankings, where they currently sit fifth on 18 points - one point and one place behind Colombia and seven points behind Argentina, who top the qualifying table. The standout news is the return of Neymar, following his stellar performances with Santos in recent weeks.

arts.ttl: Neymar recalled by Brazil for World Cup qualifiers against Colombia and Argentina
arts.sum: “He played two matches at Santos for 90 minutes. The 33-year-old striker was included in the national squad by coach Dorival Junior on Thursday for World Cup qualifiers against Colombia and Argentina this month.

arts.ttl: Brazil call-up Neymar for 1st time in 17 months
arts.sum: Neymar was called up by Brazil for the first time in 17 months after a lengthy spell out with an ACL injury.
